text: Mrs. Hugh Hammersley is an oil painting by John Singer Sargent. It was painted in 1892. It measures 81 x 45 1/2 in. (205.7 x 115.6 cm). The picture is in the Metropolitan Museum of Art in New York City.Mrs. Hugh Hammersley Metropolitan Museum of Art ==References== Category:1890s paintings Category:Paintings in the Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York City Category:American paintings
title: Mrs. Hugh Hammersley
